title: michaelvkax
author: michaelvkax
created_time: September 25, 2022, 10:11:42 PMLast edit: October 31, 2022, 08:09:05 AM by michaelvkax
content: Introduction to Vkax NetworkVkax network is an experimental project and also a part of the vkax technology which is born out of the need to create easy mining algorithm that are user friendly and devoid of asic mining. It uses its own algorithm called ‘Mike’ a variant of ghostrider algorithm. It's a digital experimental project that enables instant, private payments to anyone at any time of the day with no limitations. Vkax technology also would power its own platform called the vkax platform where smart contract, Web3, NFT etc can be created. Vkax uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network. Vkax Core is the name of the open-source software which enables the use of this network to power all its technology. Vkax is a complete fork of Dash coin which uses Masternodes and other technology to secure its blockchainThis project is created to bridge the gap that other crypto have closed. It is born out of the need to create easy mining algorithm that are user friendly and devoid of asic mining. It uses its own algorithm called ‘Mike’ a variant of ghostrider algorithm to achieve such. It's fast, private and secure payments platform were Vkax is exchanged to anyone at any time of the day with no limitations. Vkax with its peer-to-peer technology operate no central authority like dash etc: managing transactions and issuing vkax are carried out collectively by the network. Vkax Core is the best in crypto transactions, and it is an open open source software. Vkax is a complete fork of Dash coin which uses Masternodes and other technology to secure its blockchain.Vkax Network is a community project, and it does not have any developer fees which other project have used to steal from their community. Vkax developer can simply propose for fees through the governance system were Masternodes votes on any proposal be it for development fees, the project developments etc. We do not just implement anything, but it is determined by the community through our voting system. This is totally decentralized Project with no greedy developmental fees. Our governance proposal fee is none refundable 400 Vkax which is burned in the system. MiningVkax uses the mike’s algorithm which is a variant of the ghostrider algorithm and uses a smooth difficulty processRewardInitially Mining of vkax gives out the sum of 10,000 VKAX which is still active, out of which 2,500 as of old goes to Masternode owners. This 10,000 VKAX would stay until height 1950005 and within that period subsidy at every block height 210240 would take place. After height 1950005 reward would fall back to 500 VKAX and so on. Currently, the reward for mining Vkax is 3000Vkax and 6000 Vkax for masternode. See rewards belowHeight     Miner Reward  Masternode Reward34401 to 34699      7500   150034701 to 51315     3000   600051317 to 67731     3375   562567733     4000   5000LINK🌍   Website📱    Android Wallet Playstore👨‍💻  Github🔎  Vkax Block Explorer-1🔎  Vkax Block Explorer-2🔎  Vkax Block Explorer-3🏦  Download Vkax Wallet✉️  Join Our Discord Channel✉️  Twitter✉️  Whitepaper✉️  Masternode Stats🏦  Exchange One: Xeggex (VKAX_USDT) | Xeggex ( VKAX_USDC) 🏦  Exchange Two: Bitoreum (VKAX_BTRM) | VKAX_USDT | VKAX_LTC  🏦  Exchange Three: NASADAX (VKAX_USDT) | VKAX_BTC🏦  Exchange Four: APIX CASH (VKAX_BTC) 🥠  Vkax Budget Proposal ⛏️   Mike Miner Software (XMRIG)⛏️   Mining Pools🥿   Slip 0044📺    CPU Mining Video: Video 1(CPU-Mining) | Video 2 (GPU-Mining)  | Video 3 (GPU Mining)⚕️    Vkax Block API: Blocks | Address transaction https://insight.vkax.xyz/insight-api/addrs/XokxPcHPrV5tgfYxBELKvw5QRBWf72U3XhDocker:Code:docker pull vkaxproject/vkaxdElectrumx ServerCode:electrumx.vkax.xyz:52222  (ssl)electrumx.vkax.xyz:51111  (tcp)Vkax Road Map🧿  Mike algorithm 🔈 🧿  Website 🔈 🧿  Explorer 🔈 🧿  Announcement 🔈 🧿  Android (To be added on Zelcore and also development of our own Android and IOS wallet app)🧿  Fixing of Bugs 🧿 New version Release (December 31)2023 - 2024 Road Map🧿  Web3 (Similar to Dash network with vkax modifications)🧿  Mobilenode ( Specifically for mobile and IOS devices)🧿  Smart Contracts Virtual Machine (Similar to Dash network with vkax modifications)🧿  NFTs support (Similar to Dash network with vkax modifications)

comments.author: gyIQ
comments.body: hello,Wallett stopped syncing ~10 days ago.Then I installed 18.0.1, then 18.0.3 and the result is the same, it can't sync with the network.Tried wallet repair recan 1-2 and repair 1-2, without luck.On the pool I can see the payments, but right now I've got no access to my coins.sent a mail to developer@vkax.xyz, but email came back:554 5.1.1 <developer@vkax.xyz>: Recipient address rejected: undeliverable address: host mail-outgoing.relay-pe.svc.cluster.local[10.27.8.70] said: 550 5.1.1 <developer@vkax.xyz>: Recipient address rejected: User unknown in virtual mailbox table (in reply to RCPT TO command)Final-Recipient: rfc822; developer@vkax.xyzAction: failedStatus: 5.1.1Remote-MTA: dns; mx1.privateemail.com. (198.54.122.240, the server for the domain vkax.xyz.)Diagnostic-Code: smtp; 554 5.1.1 <developer@vkax.xyz>: Recipient address rejected: undeliverable address: host mail-outgoing.relay-pe.svc.cluster.local[10.27.8.70] said: 550 5.1.1 <developer@vkax.xyz>: Recipient address rejected: User unknown in virtual mailbox table (in reply to RCPT TO command)Last-Attempt-Date: Thu, 29 Sep 2022 03:21:07 -0700 (PDT)Dev, pls advise how to fix this and or provide a working email where Ican send the debug.log.Thx

comments.author: gyIQ
comments.body: For the ones are facing the same issue, but not familiar with Discord or not willing to join: select rebuild index from the wallett repair menu to fix the issue.

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: Noticed some shifty stuff after installing this wallet.If you have jLherYu.vbs on your computer, it probably came from here, or geckocoin or another scam project these guys are with. It is a trojan!Pump&Dump! No future in this project.

comments.author: Setvin
comments.created_time: October 31, 2024, 09:34:50 PMLast edit: October 31, 2024, 10:32:39 PM by Setvin
comments.body: Quote from: elmo40 on March 12, 2023, 12:59:11 AMNoticed some shifty stuff after installing this wallet.If you have jLherYu.vbs on your computer, it probably came from here, or geckocoin or another scam project these guys are with. It is a trojan!Pump&Dump! No future in this project.Are you able to show in the source code where the virus is? There is no dev fee in this project, the source code seems okay, From what I understand there was a mining pool that operated a shared masternode service and there was a mistake somehow and lost user funds. Around this same time geckocoin was identified as having a virus payload, (which only affected windows systems.)VKAX has been forked to a new repo and the windows wallet has been built using github actions. I am not a security expert but I feel pretty confident if there was a virus it was not distributed through the source code, something had to have been added in or someone made a security mistake to have their system compromised. Running what I suspect a shared masternode service on a windows machine using binaries available for download that you did not build yourself was probably not a great start. I have a belief that a coin is not the coins but the code, and VKAX is based on dash and bitcoin and is secured using asic resistant cpu mining. The loss of the shared masternode service, abandonment by the origonal dev and accusations of virus did not make VKAX a great start, but the code still works and can be changed. It provides an opportunity for those interested in learning about masternodes and dash to get started without spending thousands of dollars before they know what they are doing. as of now this project still has interest. I am attempting to provide development but realistically for severe updates we need more participants. There are tests I want to change (like some fixes ive identified) and this could be a great way for people to play around with code without feeling like they have to be apart of a severe project which is always trying to pump.

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: I did not compile the source. Used their compiled QT file. This is the risk you take. They can offer any file they want and name it the wallet's name. You have no idea until you look deeper, or run it.

comments.author: Setvin
comments.body: Quote from: elmo40 on November 03, 2024, 07:46:52 PMI did not compile the source. Used their compiled QT file. This is the risk you take. They can offer any file they want and name it the wallet's name. You have no idea until you look deeper, or run it.Yes there was a devastating virus from a coin called fulminairehttps://y3ti.uk/audits/Fulminareit has the ability to wait on your computer for months gathering keystroke data, then uploads all wallet.dat files at a set date. Its really hard to tell who is responsible for what, its such a sophisticated attack. It makes me wonder if its a state level attack.I have forked the vkax repo and made a new website and explorer. All past coins are compatible still. The current windows wallet qt has been built using github actions, meaning its straight from the source code. I also included a simple two part copy and paste instructions on how to install VKAX on ubuntu and build it from source on the new github archive. https://github.com/vkaxcore/VKAXThe code is based on bitcoin, there is no dev fee! and its cpu mining and asic resistant. It still has some merits and traded on active exchanges. Anyone who runs a masternode is a voting member of the new team.

comments.author: Setvin
comments.created_time: November 22, 2024, 03:08:16 PMLast edit: November 30, 2024, 11:15:34 AM by Setvin
comments.body:
The older explorer has gone offline, the original dev is on holiday again.Please update links to reflect the new locations:website:https://www.vkax.net/explorer:https://explorer.vkax.net/github:https://github.com/vkaxcore/vkaxgitlab mirror:https://gitlab.com/setvin/vkaxminingpoolstats:https://miningpoolstats.stream/vkaxcoinpaprika:https://coinpaprika.com/coin/vkax-vkax/coingecko:https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/vkaxreddit:https://www.reddit.com/r/cpumining/x/ twitter:https://twitter.com/vkaxcorediscord:https://discord.gg/yKSKufyJmax supply 21,000,000,000current supply: https://explore.vkax.net/ext/getmoneysupplyBlock time:150sMore information for curious:Start node on linux ubuntu virtual machineCopy and paste the below text into a Ubuntu terminal to download and start vkax graphic walletCode:mkdir ~/.vkaxcore &&cd ~/.vkaxcore &&wget https://github.com/realsetvin/blockchain-bootstraps/releases/download/Vkax/vkax-ubuntu22-github-build.zip &&unzip -d ~/.vkaxcore vkax-ubuntu22-github-build.zip &&wget https://github.com/vkaxcore/VKAX/releases/download/v100.10.4/VKAXbootstrap2024.zip &&unzip -d ~/.vkaxcore VKAXbootstrap2024.zip &&rm -R VKAXbootstrap2024.zip &&chmod +x -R ~/.vkaxcore/ &&touch ~/.vkaxcore/vkax.conf &&echo -e "maxconnections=256
rpcport=11111
rpcallowip=127.0.0.1
listen=1
server=1
daemon=1
#masternodeblsprivkey=
#externalip=[NODE_IP_ADDRESS]:11110
addnode=129.213.125.65" >> ~/.vkaxcore/vkax.conf &&~/.vkaxcore/vkax-qt -usehd=1How to run a windows wallet and start mininghttps://setvin.medium.com/how-to-create-a-vkax-wallet-node-and-start-mining-automatically-on-boot-windows-e8cc44dc6f08How to run a VKAX daemon on a mobile phonehttps://medium.com/@setvin/how-to-install-vkax-core-node-on-android-phone-using-termux-ubuntu-arm-instance-eee97e9b2d19

comments.author: Setvin
comments.body: wanted to share two things I createdVKAX Faucet, with a card game attached. Need testers! Should work on phones and computers. In testing, features may change. https://game.vkax.net/faucetVKAX Whale Alert script! Connects to local daemon, scans the last 100 blocks, creates and serves an RSS xml file which can be used by social media. https://github.com/vkaxcore/vkax-whale-alertOther developers are welcome to share or use this tool for their own chains.can see it in action https://alert.vkax.net/see an example of its usehttps://x.com/vkaxwhale

comments.author: Setvin
comments.body: Adding a flappy bird type game to the faucet, still working on it off and on as a hobby.Quorum is expected to be met by end of FebuaryWorking on a new discord to condense vkax related activities. Doing this in partner with a Zealy quest campaign, this will be a way for users to earn free VKAX weekly by participating. Some random thoughts,Did you know that Code (so for example, VKAX) is protected under freedom of speech in USA?Quote    This court can find no meaningful difference between computer language, particularly high-level languages as defined above, and German or French....Like music and mathematical equations, computer language is just that, language, and it communicates information either to a computer or to those who can read it...    -Judge Patel, April 15, 1996Bernstein v. Department of JusticeI am not as confident that dogs with hats are protected under such laws, they are probably honestly closer to securities and in my opinion may one day be more fiercely regulated, while the use of code will not change. At least, in certain counties. But the policy of that country affects a lot of users of crypto, considering USDC and USDT are main trading pairs and some of the most popular options.
